column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I have never been happier to re-rate a restaurant than at Bavette's Bar and Boeuf.  We finally got the experience that everyone had been praising about - and after this time
column2: we WILL be back. The food and the service was phenomenal.  We came here for my birthday.  The special occasion was acknowledged by pretty much every staff member we encountered - from the host stand to the waiter and everyone in between.  Again
column4: which is always a plus for a busy restaurant like this on a Saturday night.
